title: EVEN COUNT
text:
Let f(x) be the product of digits of a number.Given L and R, find the number of values of 'i' such that L ≤ i ≤ R and f(i) iseven.InputThe first line consists of an integer t, the number of test cases. For each test case, you are given the two integers L and R.OutputFor each test case, print the number of values of 'i' such that L ≤ i ≤ R and f(i) is even.Constraints1 ≤ t ≤ 1001 ≤ L ≤ R ≤ 1000000000SampleInput:2
2 12
4 23Output:6
12
